title: Score trends - regression detection visualization
description: Build a score trends visualization that shows how scores change over time across evaluations. This enables regression detection by highlighting when scores drop below historical baselines. Should integrate with the existing dashboard and provide drill-down into specific test cases.
acceptance_criteria: Trend chart showing score history over time (last N runs)
Regression detection: highlight runs where scores dropped significantly
Threshold visualization: show baseline/target lines on chart
Drill-down: click a point to see individual test case results
Group by test suite or scorer type
Statistical summary: mean, std dev, trend direction
